title: Android Auto 7.7 fixes issues faced by some Galaxy S22 owners, causes new problems for others
content:
The latest update to Android Auto includes fixes for some of the issues that prevented some Galaxy S22 owners from connecting their phone to their car, but may have caused new problems for others.

moreâ€¦

The post Android Auto 7.7 fixes issues faced by some Galaxy S22 owners, causes new problems for others appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android Auto update fixes issue that prevented Galaxy S22 from connecting, but may have caused new problems for others.
